## Description {#details}

Represents a predicate at the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> level.

The control flow a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetinstrinfo/machinebranchpredicate">MachineBranchPredicate</a> represents is:

Reg = LHS <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/predicate">Predicate</a></code> RHS == ConditionDef if Reg then goto TrueDest else goto FalseDest

Definition at line 674 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetinstrinfo-h">TargetInstrInfo.h</a>.
